column4: I've been on IRC for 12 years, and I can't recall being in any sort of support channel and having there be no bot. Most of the ubuto links carry the answers people are looking for, but aren't a hand hold through the entire process of setting up whatever it is people are looking to fix
But if someone had to retype the answers to the same questions 20 times a day they'd go mental
things like installing nvidia drivers comes up every 15 minutes in here, nobody would get any help if the helpers were constantly telling people how to install those drivers
There was no bot on #gentoo when I was a regular there, and people got better answers as a result, imho.
